Author: potiat
Text: Well, as a bulimic myself, i would avoid any kind of comment on how she looks for anyone who has an eating disorder. If you really want to talk to her about it, maybe you should ease into it or wait for her to start a conversation, and listen to how she feels, without giving advice, or telling her what she should/shouldn't do. At least thats what i wanted when i was seeking help. I just wanted to be heard. I hope this helps you in some way ^^.
